description: Mana is getting frustrated at Yorito for going to take pictures of the sky when he is supposed to be visiting his sister Aono in the hospital. The day before Aono`s birthday, Mana has to practically drag Yorito around to order a cake, and the two go and visit Aono in the hospital later. Yorito decides to bring Aono some photos of the sky the next time he visits; Aono asks for a photo of the sunrise. Yorito goes home to print out photos but thinks something is wrong with them and goes out to take a new one, meeting a strange girl in the process.
